snippet: The news of two deaths at Electric Zoo 2013, the fifth annual Labor Day weekend of electronic music on Randalls Island, casts a sorrowful shadow over what was supposed to be a celebration.
abstract: Jon Pareles Critic's Notebook holds that deaths of two concertgoers from using MDMA at Electric Zoo 2013, fifth annual Labor Day weekend of electronic music on Randalls Island, cast sorrowful shadow over what was supposed to be celebration; says deaths are jarring reminder of mortality in midst of music genre that celebrates eternal present.
lead_paragraph: The news of two deaths at Electric Zoo 2013, the fifth annual Labor Day weekend of electronic music on Randalls Island, casts a sorrowful shadow over what was supposed to be a celebration.

headline.print_headline: Dancing in the Eternal Present, Before Harsh Reality Intervened
headline.seo: Electric Zoo Festival Cut Short by Two Deaths
headline.main: Dancing in the Eternal Present, Before Harsh Reality Intervened
